title: I am a Full-stack developer specializing in Frontend with 2 years of experience. My passion is creating applications focusing on usability, performance, and user experience (UX). I am eager to continue growing and learning every day, and my dream is to create applications that improve the lives of thousands of people.

work: I developed the frontend of Busquemostrabajo.com from scratch, among other similar projects.
I optimized the website so that it has the best possible score in Google page speed.
Increase the speed of the first load by 50%.
I improved the SEO and accessibility of the pages I worked with.
I applied CI/CD in the projects I worked on.
